source.sqlReaderQuery: select count(*) as rowcnt from saleslt.customer

select Title,FirstName,MiddleName,LastName,AddressLine1,AddressLine2,City,StateProvince,CountryRegion,PostalCode
from
[SalesLT].[Customer] as c inner join
[SalesLT].[CustomerAddress] as ca 
on c.CustomerID=ca.CustomerID
inner join [SalesLT].[Address] a
on a.AddressID=ca.AddressID

activities.name: Get Last Modified Date from Table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(modifieddate) as LastModifiedDate from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified Date from Table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select  * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get High Water Mark Date').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}'

activities.name: Get Last Modified Date from Table

source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(modifieddate) as LastModifiedDate from saleslt.customer

dependsOn.activity: Get Last Modified Date from Table

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select  * from saleslt.customer where modifieddate > '@{activity('Get High Water Mark Date').output.firstRow.HighWaterMarkDate}'
and modifieddate <= '@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}'
select 'Customer' as Table_Name,'@{activity('Get Last Modified Date from Table').output.firstRow.LastModifiedDate}' as HighWaterMarkDate
